parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John TOBIN, Appellant. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Christopher Louis SMITH, Appellant. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Kevin BEATTY, Appellant. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of APRIL, 1993 the appeals are affirmed. Commonwealth v. Eric Dickerson, 533 Pa. 294, 621 A.2d 990 (1993).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

opinions.text:
LARSEN, J.,
dissents on the basis of his dissenting opinion filed in Commonwealth v. Dickerson, 533 Pa. 294, 621 A.2d 990 (1993), which is joined by PAPADAKOS, J.
opinions.author: LARSEN, J.,
